event_text: m_c fell from a cliff but survived and came back with a tale of a brave grapple worm that will from now on be {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} best friend.
m_c finds a grapple worm and decides to carry it around.
m_c has a newfound fascination with worms. Grapple worms, specifically. Now {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} always carries one around.
m_c has a newfound fascination with worms. Grapple worms, specifically. Now {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} always carries one around.
m_c went for a walk and found a cute acc_singular. It now lives in the camp, though it was hard for m_c to convince {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} clanmates not to eat {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} friend.
The apprentices of the Clan are taking special training to learn how to land on enemies when jumping from trees.

As a storm rages and the branches of the forest whip around outside, m_c is tucked up in the medicine slugcat den, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} sleep anything but restful. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/keep/keeps} seeing flashes of prophecy_list_sight. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/wake/wakes} with a shiver, wondering what {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} dreams mean for the Clan.

The things {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} saw today, omen_list_sight... m_c conceals {PRONOUN/m_c/self} in a hidden alcove under branches that drip all the way to the ground, needing privacy as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/consider/considers} what these new omens foretell.

Like a seed just beginning to sprout, m_c is now on {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} journey to becoming a full warrior of c_n. With a proud gaze, r_c presents {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} slugpup with acc_singular. r_c knows that one day m_c will grow big and strong, just like a little seed can grow into a strong tree.
